channel.title: [Glitch] Lantern is not working as it should
channel.description:
Well, when I first play the mod, i thought i'll get the lantern with the suit and stuff, buuut, through the levels I realized that the lantern doesn't iluminate "environment"
I mean: if I iluminate a wall with a chair by its side, the lantern iluminate the chair but not the wall or the surrounding whatsoever, it iluminates just some "objects" but not the whole area/environment
I have no problem with the graphics at all, and I have a Nvidia 6200 with 256 mb of ram, in fact the gameplay has been quite nice until now, and that's the only problem that I've seen :c
